heading: HB04954
0: AN ACT MANDATING ALL GOVERNMENT AGENCIES TO IMPLEMENT A "NO CONTACT" POLICY WITH REGARDS TO ALL TRANSACTIONS, APPLICATIONS, PERMITS, PRIVILEGES, LICENSES, CONCESSIONS OR AN EXTENSION OR RENEWAL THEREOF AND ANY OTHER BUSINESS DEALING WHICH INVOLVES ANY PAYMENT, FEE, OR ANY EXCHANGE OF MONETARY VALUE FOR SERVICES THAT THE GOVERNMENT IS AUTHORIZED OR REQUIRED  TO PERFORM AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on CIVIL SERVICE AND PROFESSIONAL REGULATION since 2017-02-13
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04954
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING ALL GOVERNMENT AGENCIES TO IMPLEMENT A "NO CONTACT" POLICY WITH REGARDS TO ALL TRANSACTIONS, APPLICATIONS, PERMITS, PRIVILEGES, LICENSES, CONCESSIONS OR AN EXTENSION OR RENEWAL THEREOF AND ANY OTHER BUSINESS DEALING WHICH INVOLVES ANY PAYMENT, FEE, OR ANY EXCHANGE OF MONETARY VALUE FOR SERVICES THAT THE GOVERNMENT IS AUTHORIZED OR REQUIRED TO PERFORM AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LOPEZ, MANUEL LUIS T.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Nieto (004 2017-07-31)2. Olivarez (020 2017-09-07)
3. Malapitan (025 2017-09-18)4. Castelo (000 2017-10-02)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON CIVIL SERVICE AND PROFESSIONAL REGULATION ON 2017-02-13
